content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
* System *

  • Update to official Poly/ML 5.9.2, with minor changes to word and
    floating-point arithmetic.

This refers to Isabelle/a356fd7ca1c4 where the polyml component now includes
Intel macOS executables.

Moreover, in Isabelle/08722f90a439 I have a recent test on word arithmethic by
Florian Haftmann: "discontinue obsolete test from d4eaefc626ec: max_index is
the largest possible word".

Makarius
